item.title: Things to know before you start programming
item.description: Some days ago, I was reading Guido Van Rossum’s Google Plus Page, and I found a link that he shared under this description “I was so impressed with this I am posting it to G+ and tweeting it “. As I admire a lot this guy, because he is the creator of the greatest programming language ever existed, I inmediately opened it. The story is about the things and warnings you should know before you start programming, under the title; Things I Wish Someone Had Told Me When I Was Learning How to Code.
